tasks.title: Writing Task 1
instructions: You should spend about 20 minutes on this task.
The graph below shows the number of complaints made about noise to Environmental Health authorities in the city of Newtown between 1980 and 1996.
Summarise the information by selecting and reporting the main features, and make comparisons where relevant.

tasks.title: Writing Task 2
instructions: You should spend about 40 minutes on this task.
Many people say that cooking and eating at home is better for the individual and the family than eating out in restaurants or canteens.
Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.
